```{r}
library(lpSolveAPI)

IP <- make.lp(0, 7)
invisible(lp.control(IP, sense = "min", verbose = "neutral"))

set.objfn(IP, c(775, 800, 800, 800, 800, 775, 750))

req <- c(Sun=18, Mon=27, Tue=22, Wed=26, Thu=25, Fri=21, Sat=19)

add.constraint(IP, c(0,1,1,1,1,1,0), ">=", req["Sun"])

add.constraint(IP, c(0,0,1,1,1,1,1), ">=", req["Mon"])

add.constraint(IP, c(1,0,0,1,1,1,1), ">=", req["Tue"])

add.constraint(IP, c(1,1,0,0,1,1,1), ">=", req["Wed"])

add.constraint(IP, c(1,1,1,0,0,1,1), ">=", req["Thu"])

add.constraint(IP, c(1,1,1,1,0,0,1), ">=", req["Fri"])

add.constraint(IP, c(1,1,1,1,1,0,0), ">=", req["Sat"])

set.type(IP, 1:7, "integer")

colnames <- c("Shift 1 (off Sun,Mon)",
              "Shift 2 (off Mon,Tue)",
              "Shift 3 (off Tue,Wed)",
              "Shift 4 (off Wed,Thu)",
              "Shift 5 (off Thu,Fri)",
              "Shift 6 (off Fri,Sat)",
              "Shift 7 (off Sat,Sun)")
rownames <- names(req)
dimnames(IP) <- list(rownames, colnames)

status <- solve(IP)
if (status != 0) stop("Solver did not find an optimal solution.")

x <- get.variables(IP)
names(x) <- colnames
total_cost <- get.objective(IP)

A <- rbind(
  c(0,1,1,1,1,1,0),  
  c(0,0,1,1,1,1,1),  
  c(1,0,0,1,1,1,1),  
  c(1,1,0,0,1,1,1), 
  c(1,1,1,0,0,1,1),  
  c(1,1,1,1,0,0,1),  
  c(1,1,1,1,1,0,0)   
)
day_names <- c("Sun","Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat")

available <- as.numeric(A %*% x)
names(available) <- day_names

report <- data.frame(
  Day       = day_names,
  Required  = as.integer(req[day_names]),
  Available = as.integer(available),
  Surplus   = as.integer(available - req[day_names])
)

cat("\n--- Solution Summary ---\n")
cat(sprintf("Total weekly wage cost: $%s\n\n",
            formatC(total_cost, format = "f", digits = 0, big.mark = ",")))

cat("Optimal number of workers starting each shift:\n")
print(x)

cat("\nWorkers required vs. available per day:\n")
print(report, row.names = FALSE)


```
The total weekly cost will be $25,675.
